    Methods in plasystem_functions with parameters of type TransactionItemData
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private boolean
    TransactionDataManager.validateTransactionItem(TransactionItemData item)
    Validates a transaction item based on schema constraints for the TransactionItems table (e.g., non-null fields, positive quantity, non-negative prices, total price at least equal to unit price).
    Method parameters in plasystem_functions with type arguments of type TransactionItemData
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    TransactionDataManager.addTransaction(String transDateYear, String transDateMonth, String transDateDay, String transDateTime, double totalAmount, double paymentAmount, double changeAmount, List<TransactionItemData> transactionItems)
    Adds a new transaction to the database, including its items, and updates product quantities in a single transaction.
    double
    TransactionDataManager.getTotal(List<TransactionItemData> items)
    Calculates the total value of a list of transaction items, summing their total prices and rounding the result to two decimal places.
